title: Royal Allegiance eSports is Seeking a Business Partner & Co Owner
body:
Royal Allegiance eSport was formed on 16th of May 2016.

Currently the organisation is under a sole ownership. 

We are seeking a suitable person to help move our organisation move forward.

This can be in the role of any of the following:

Investors
Experienced business owners
Business Advisers
Understands the stability and running of organisations

We are also open to hear other creative and unique ways you can help our organisation.

If you're interested in being apart of the organisation as a Co owner please email at

raesportsclub@gmail.com

We will set up a meeting to discuss any and all questions you may have.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RAeSports/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ra_esports
Web: http://royalallegianceesports.my-free.website/

Kind Regards

replies.body:
Fuark saw the site looks serious guys, i envy you! Wish you guys good luck and all and hope you get in OPL :D 

Im can be the cheerleader <3
